### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://dragontea.ink/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdragontea.ink%2F) ### Comment > When you first load the link (www.dragontea.ink) It has the website logo then a popup ad loads on the screen and is blocked then it stays on that screen asking you to turn off your ad-blocker. Pero cuando deshabilito la extensión y vuelvo a ingresar la palabra en la casilla de este diccionario, sale la definición y por supuesto emerge el anuncio en la parte derecha de la pantalla sin AdGuard. Además sale videos de hasta diez segundos de vez en cuando. Hace un tiempo que ha dejado de funcionar, pero solía funcionar bien antes. comment.body:
We need an original link/website from which this popup was opened, but you can try to add this rule:
```adblock
||betway.co.za^$popup
```
to user rules.

By the way, content blockers have limited abilities and support only basic rules, so some popups/popunders cannot be blocked.
You can install AdGuard for Android (https://adguard.com/adguard-android/overview.html), it has more options and can better block popups/popunders.

Issue caused by Estonian List due to this rule (same for gmx.net):
`||ui-portal.de^$third-party,domain=~mail.com|~gmx.com`
For user filter:
`@@||ui-portal.de^$domain=web.de|gmx.net`

Dropped a message to filter author at https://adblock.ee/
